bites.bite: The largest adm_1 is Pattani with 17 reports followed by Narathiwat with 11 reports.
The largest adm_2 is Bannang Sata district with 3 reports followed by Mayo district with 3 reports.
The largest adm_1 is Narathiwat with 909 reports followed by Pattani with 893 reports.
The largest adm_2 is with 917 reports followed by Mueang Yala district with 127 reports.
The largest adm_1 is Pattani with 17 reports followed by Narathiwat with 11 reports.
